changeSet.sql: --------------------------------------------------------------- -- PROCEDURE: getPopularBookmarks -- INPUT: inPastDays, count -- OUTPUT: NONE CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION getPopularBookmarks(IN startTime timestamp with time zone, IN endTime timestamp with time zone, IN maxCount integer) RETURNS SETOF RECORD AS $c$ BEGIN RETURN QUERY SELECT bmk.*, u.*, l.*, bookmarkTags(bmk.id) as tags, null as folders FROM link as l, "user" as u, (SELECT b.*, count(*) as cnt FROM bookmark as b WHERE startTime <= b.last_updated AND b.last_updated < endTime GROUP BY b.link_id ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT maxCount) AS bmk WHERE l.id = bmk.link_id AND u.id = bmk.user_id; END; $c$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
